input_args.text: 'NASA\'s opportunity rover came across a strange area on the red planet # www.universe-seeker.com 5 \nNASA came with the opportunity rover to hold in a strange area on the red planet. Last month the opportunity rover took some images fro a strange perfect triangular object. First reactions from people were that it was just a weird shadow, but the angles seemed to be too perfect to be "just a shadow". now, a few days leter, that same opportunity rover took some images from a side view of that same anomaly, and it turns out that it is anything but "just a shadow" or "just a rock". see for yourself. Tags'
